title: The Dangerous Lover
overview: In the chess game, Hu Tian foresaw the outcome of the entire Hu family being slaughtered. In order to change his fate, Tian Tian Lalang and the downtrodden prince Su Yanli, who had a "rebirth" experience, tried to guide the villain brother to do good. Unexpectedly, Su Yanli might be The culprit who wiped out the Hu family, the two are in extreme tension, Tiantian slowly learns about Su Yanli and her fateful origins.
